com.brogrammers.agora.views

Class QuestionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.brogrammers.agora.views.QuestionAdapter

  • public class QuestionAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Question adapter is required to assemble the question object for the UI implementation. This is used to update list views in order to browse questions (US 1)
    Author:
    Group02
